The post Rang de Basanti appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Rang de Basanti

Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a Fun event named “RANG DE BASANTI”. It was an online reel submission event. This event was conducted on 5th & 6th February 2022.

It had 45 registrations and 27 responses from participants.

Event Details –
It was a reel-making event. This event was categorized into 3 parts. The participant could make reels on any of the following categories –

  1. Kite making: – They can make handmade Kites with their unique ideas and send us a video or picture of them.
  2. Food Mania: – They can make food as per theme and click its pictures or make a video while making it.
  3. Dress up: – They can dress up as per theme and can add their pictures in reels.

The submissions were done via Google form.

item.title: Doorway to ACES
item.dc:creator: Sharanjit Singh

On the first day of the event, all the participants were called to introduce themselves and share their hobbies, goals and etc so that […]

The post Doorway to ACES appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Doorway to ACES

Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized an interactive event named “DOORWAY TO ACES”. It was conducted on 2nd February 2022. The event was conducted on Google Meet. On the first day of the event, all the participants were called to introduce themselves and share their hobbies, goals and etc so that it will reduce their public speaking fears. They also got a golden opportunity to interact with their respective seniors and teachers. Students found this event very helpful and useful as they got more to know about ACES and their branch. On the second day of the event interview session held where we select the active members for ACES. There were 64 online registrations with a total of 50 students participating in this event.

Below are the details of the event: –

DATE: 25th January 2022

The first-day ‘INTERACTION PROGRAMME’ was broken into 3 parts: –

●      Part 1- Interaction Programme from 11:00 AM to 11:30 AM

●      Part 2- Come to know about ACES from 11:30 AM to 12:15 PM

●      Part 3- Questioning and answering from 12:15 PM to 12:30 PM

●      Participants: – 50+

Date: 2nd February 2022

The second-day’ DOORWAY TO ACES’ held from 3:30 PM to 5:00 PM.

●      Participants: – 46

The event was conducted on campus grounds near Nescafe where all participants were called […]

The post Race to Win appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Race to Win

Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a Fun event named “RACE TO WIN”. It was a three-round event, Round 1 was conducted on 12th October 2021 and Round 2 and 3 were conducted on 13th October 2021. The event was conducted on campus grounds near Nescafe where all participants were called for a series of rounds involving mind-body coordination type games. There were 100 online registrations and 39 on-spot registration with a total of 139 students participating in this event.

Below are the details of the event: –

Round 1: –

The first round ‘Galaxy Racer’ was broken into 3 parts:-

  • Part 1- Bucket-ball Challenge from 3:30 PM to 4:00 PM
  • Part 2- Bowl the cup from 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
  • Part 3- Pic a treasure from 4:32 PM to 4:42 PM

Participants: – 23 Teams

Round 2: –

The second round ‘Guess the building’ held from 3:30 PM to 4:30 PM.

Participants: – 8 Teams

Round 3: –

The third round ‘Blow the balloons’ was conducted from 4:45 PM to 4:49 PM.

Participants: – 4 Teams

3 teams were given 1st, 2nd, and 3rd positions as listed below.

item.title: Article Writing Contest
item.dc:creator: Sharanjit Singh
item.description:
Article Writing Contest An online article writing event was organized by the Association of Civil Engineering Students from 12th September to 16th September 2021. The event was led and executed successfully under the able guidance of Prof.Yuvraj Singh . The event was a part of one of the various technical and social events organized by […]

The post Article Writing Contest appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Article Writing Contest

An online article writing event was organized by the Association of Civil Engineering Students from 12th September to 16th September 2021. The event was led and executed successfully under the able guidance of Prof.Yuvraj Singh .

The event was a part of one of the various technical and social events organized by ACES. These events are organized from time to time with the objective to provide a platform for the students to showcase their talent with a competitive spirit.

The event was successful enough to attract as many as 40+ registrations. The themes for the event included sustainable engineering, automation in engineering, road safety, and traffic management, and recent advances in engineering.

The winners were encouraged with a certificate, trophies and were given the chance to become a part of the college’s newsletter editor board. The participants were also given certificates as a token of encouragement.

item.title: Felicitation Ceremony
item.dc:creator: Sharanjit Singh
item.description:
ACES Felicitation Ceremony ACES organized “Felicitation ceremony – 2021” on 15th September 2021 in TCC seminar Hall – 1, where we all bid farewell to our seniors of the outgoing batch (2017-21) with great enthusiasm and of course nostalgia. The Event started at 2:05 p.m. with an inspirational speech by Dr, Punitpal Singh Cheema then […]

The post Felicitation Ceremony appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
ACES Felicitation Ceremony

ACES organized “Felicitation ceremony – 2021” on 15th September 2021 in TCC seminar Hall – 1, where we all bid farewell to our seniors of the outgoing batch (2017-21) with great enthusiasm and of course nostalgia.

The Event started at 2:05 p.m. with an inspirational speech by Dr, Punitpal Singh Cheema then Host Sarabjeet Kaur officially Started the Event with her welcoming speech in which she also
discussed the events that were earlier organized by ACES.
After that, the stage was handed over to Sharanjit Singh who further handled the hosting of the event. Then the felicitation of our seniors started, they were all given mementos by the Head of Department H.S. Rai, ACES faculty Head Dr. Puneet Pal Singh Cheema, and ACES faculty members Prof. Yuvraj Singh, Prof. Mandeep Kaur, Prof. Avneet Kaur, and Prof. Pritpal Kaur.

Seniors to be Felicitated
Sr. No. Senior Former Post
1Shubhendra Kumar Convener
2Khushboo Mam Co-Convener
3Parul Mam Co-Convener
4Jashan Mam Student Advisor

This was followed by the felicitation of Alumni Arjun Sharma who cleared IES with AIR 42. He motivated students to follow their dreams in his speech, he was then awarded a trophy by our HOD and faculty advisors.

After this a song performance was done by Simran and Sahil, followed by certificates and mementos to current 4th-year ACES members and post holders.

Glimpse

Then Dr. H.S. Rai gave his speech and motivated students to take ACES to new heights. Then Manpreet Singh former secretary ACES gave his last year report. Followed by new post announcement by Prof. Yuvraj Singh. They were congratulated and motivated to take ACES to new heights.

Then the passing out seniors shared their experience in ACES with everyone and thanked everyone for organising such a surprise for them. This was followed by a vote thanks from the newly elected Co-convener Charanpreet Singh. This was the end of the event.
